dcterms:creator: M. Rodriguez
dcterms:description: A dataset containing a set of actions collected from various sports typically featured on broadcast channels such as ESPN or BBC, consisting of 150 videos with 10 different action categories.
dcterms:title: UCF Sports Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. C. Niebles
C.-W. Chen
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from YouTube sequences containing 16 different sports categories with 50 videos per class, totaling 800 videos.
dcterms:title: Olympic Sports Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Kuehne
H. Jhuang
E. Garrote
T. Poggio
T. Serre
dcterms:description: A large video database for human motion recognition, providing three train-test splits each consisting of 5100 videos labeled with 51 action categories.
dcterms:title: Human Motion Database (HMDB51)
